name: Nhóm Nhóm
description:
You control a slime pirate waiter, serve slimes customers and deliver their respective orders.

The game supports gamepads (all players) and keyboard (only for the 1st player), controls are available in the "?" button of the main menu.

The multiplayer functionality is local only, but softwares like Parsec can be used to play online.
